gate_name: The Army (The Role of the Self in Interaction)

7.1.hd_quote: The iron hand, both enlightened and despotic.
7.1.behavioral_axis: Establishes clear authority structures and hierarchical boundaries to provide security and foundation for collective leadership.
7.1.shadow_axis: Insists only they know best and refuses input from others, creating rigidity and eventual organizational failure.
7.1.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

7.2.hd_quote: The ability to lead by serving the will of the majority.
7.2.behavioral_axis: Naturally embodies leadership capacity that others recognize and call out, leading by serving the will of the majority through democratic process.
7.2.shadow_axis: Once chosen, feels superior to those who selected them and dismisses the intelligence of the very people who recognized their role.
7.2.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

7.3.hd_quote: The rejection of any institutionalized order.
7.3.behavioral_axis: Experiments through trial and error to discover which leadership roles and institutional patterns work, breaking bonds and burning structures to make space for new forms.
7.3.shadow_axis: Denies value in any role through pure nihilism, destroying patterns without purpose and creating destabilization through constant rejection.
7.3.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

7.4.hd_quote: The grace and wisdom to step down for the benefit of the whole.
7.4.behavioral_axis: Externalizes leadership role through networks and opportunities, stepping down gracefully when collective backing shifts to accept the judgment of others.
7.4.shadow_axis: Refuses to accept when their time is up and must be forced from power by overwhelming opposition, breeding revolt through expired leadership.
7.4.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

7.5.hd_quote: Leadership whose authority must be absolute and is sanctioned by society in times of crisis.
7.5.behavioral_axis: Receives projections as the savior leader in times of crisis and selectively answers the call, attracting loyalty necessary to harmonize society's potential through absolute authority.
7.5.shadow_axis: Remains isolated when crisis demands leadership, threatening others through absence and creating danger by refusing to fulfill the projected role when needed.
7.5.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

7.6.hd_quote: The ability to share and justly apportion power.
7.6.behavioral_axis: Recognizes that all human beings have leadership roles and communicates frameworks for sharing and apportioning power justly across the collective.
7.6.shadow_axis: Creates entrenched bureaucracies whose administrative power destabilizes organizations and overshadows those elected to lead, accumulating power through systemic control.
7.6.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks
